short_summary: Installation of buoys in the province of Newfoundland and Labrador. The contract was awarded to who.
description: Installation and servicing of buoys in the province of Newfoundland and Labrador. ENDUSRNT FOR Provision, Maintenance, Inspection and Removal of aids to navigation Only applicable for buoys installed by Fishery, Ocean and Governmental departments. DECISN CIVATE To be approved.
